attributes.action: initiate a radical review and overhaul of Children's Services in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yet again, today, we hear of another failing Children's Services department (Doncaster Council), this on the back of the highly publicised Baby P and Victoria Climbie cases.  We cannot continue to sit back and watch as children's lives are destroyed.  Please sign and give the government the message that something must be done.
